ing: 1 tablespoon prepared horseradish, or to taste
12 drops hot pepper sauce (such as TabascoÂ®)
des: "My father-in-law made this all the time for family gatherings. We recently received the recipe and now prepare it for our family. It requires a few more ingredients than most, but they are common items that have a long shelf-life. It's definitely worth it."
ins:
Stir ketchup, chili sauce, lemon juice, horseradish, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce together in a bowl until smooth.
Cover bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 15 minutes.
